alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 12:23PM CST until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Webster, Bossier and Bienville Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat at Dixie Inn. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 17.0 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.9 feet on 05/07/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 1230 PM CST.
